headline: Dayforce Inc. Reports Earnings Results for the First Quarter Ended March 31, 2025
summary: Dayforce Inc. reported earnings results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2025. For the first quarter, the company reported revenue was USD 481.8 million compared to USD 431.5 million a year ago....
